description: A six-year-old wins a competition to design Pescara football club's shirt for next season.
title: Pescara football club adopts Italian boy's shirt design
title_page: Pescara football club adopts Italian boy's shirt design - BBC News
maintext: Italian sports kit supplier Erre¨¤ will make the shirts and has invited Luigi to spend a special day at its Parma headquarters, to see the new team strip coming off the production line.
